thread.title_full: Playboy model thought she would DIE after getting boob implants | Daily Star

author: Alex Hickson
title: Playboy model thought she would DIE after getting boob implants | Daily Star
text:
“I prayed every night because I thought I was going to die” Karen McDougal 
Karen, from Phoenix in Arizona, said: "I think, like every girl, I wanted to enhance my appearance and I wanted my chest to be bigger and feel more womanly." 
But after the op she claims to have experienced only mild symptoms until January 2016. 
She said: "I started noticing something weird was going on with my body in January. 
"I was getting blurred vision and would pass out a few times a day. 
"Severe migraines, light and sound sensitivity - even the own sound of my voice was painful. It was very emotional and so painful. TOWIE babe Nicole Bass TOWIE babe Nicole Bass flaunts her sexy beach bod! 1 / 44 HOSPITAL: Karen ended up getting the boob job reversed 
By October, Karen says she was confined to her bed. 
She added: "I prayed every night because I thought I was going to die." 
After seeing a number of doctors she decided to have the implants removed and now her health is considerably better.She said: "I actually feel great. 
CATERS BETTER: Karen says her health is now much better 
"I've noticed I have more energy, my light sensitivity is gone, my hearing sensitivity is gone, severe migraines gone, joint pain gone, blurry vision gone, dizziness and blacking out gone." 
Karen has now gone public with her story to ask women to consider possible side effects. 
"We can't let that happen to other women." She added: "It's important to do your research, study and try to find hidden information." Playboy Miss Social Take a look at the hottest girls taking part in 'Miss Social' for Playboy 1 / 10 Playboy Miss Social competition 
Dr Rankin, from Aqua Plastic Surgery in Florida performed the operation 31st January. 
He said: "At first I was skeptical of breast implants illness, but I am seeing a lot of women getting better right away, I think there's a susceptibility in some women and their body fights the foreign part." Related articles
